divs: sighting detailsat approimally 03:29am on 6\8\2013. i witness a ufo. i watched this light zoom across the at very high speed. it travled on a steady course unwaving. it was travling from the southwest to the north on my compass. i watched it until it faded from sight. then at 3:54am another light moving acroos the sky. at a very high rate of speed. travling from the same southwest route. 20 degress west of magnitic north. then at 4:54am there was a light coming from the north to the southwet area. also unwaving. during each sight there were these flashing lights from airplains. when i could no longer see these objects they leave.
Summary: a very bright star like and a smaller star light and there were at least four in the sky
